attrs.name: direction
descs: property type: Enum ( Direction  )
Which direction to stroke between the start and end angles.

attrs.name: end_angle
descs: property type: AngleSpec
The angles to end the wedges, as measured from the horizontal.

attrs.name: fill_alpha
descs: property type: NumberSpec
The fill alpha values for the wedges.

attrs.name: fill_color
descs: property type: ColorSpec
The fill color values for the wedges.

attrs.name: js_callbacks
descs: property type: Dict ( String , List ( Instance ( CustomJS  ) ) )

A mapping of attribute names to lists of CustomJS callbacks, to be set up on
BokehJS side when the document is created.

Typically, rather then modifying this property directly, callbacks should be
added using the Model.js_on_change method:

attrs.name: line_alpha
descs: property type: NumberSpec
The line alpha values for the wedges.

attrs.name: line_cap
descs: property type: Enum ( LineCap  )
The line cap values for the wedges.

attrs.name: line_color
descs: property type: ColorSpec
The line color values for the wedges.

attrs.name: line_dash
descs: property type: DashPattern
The line dash values for the wedges.

attrs.name: line_dash_offset
descs: property type: Int
The line dash offset values for the wedges.

attrs.name: line_join
descs: property type: Enum ( LineJoin  )
The line join values for the wedges.

attrs.name: line_width
descs: property type: NumberSpec
The line width values for the wedges.

attrs.name: name
descs: property type: String
An arbitrary, user-supplied name for this model.

This name can be useful when querying the document to retrieve specific
Bokeh models.

attrs.name: radius
descs: property type: DistanceSpec
Radii of the wedges.

attrs.name: start_angle
descs: property type: AngleSpec
The angles to start the wedges, as measured from the horizontal.

attrs.name: tags
descs: property type: List ( Any  )

An optional list of arbitrary, user-supplied values to attach to this
model.

This data can be useful when querying the document to retrieve specific
Bokeh models:

Or simply a convenient way to attach any necessary metadata to a model
that can be accessed by CustomJS callbacks, etc.

attrs.name: visible
descs: property type: Bool
Whether the glyph should render or not.

attrs.name: x
descs: property type: NumberSpec
The x-coordinates of the points of the wedges.

attrs.name: y
descs: property type: NumberSpec
The y-coordinates of the points of the wedges.
